message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"to forget","sentence":"她忘了手机。","image_prompt":"A young woman in simple clothing searches her bag and looks worried, realizing her phone is missing. The style is animated and gentle, suggesting a calm but surreal deserted world.","sentence_translation":"She forgot her phone."}
